Alan Floyd

International Finance/Logistics

Hello, my name is Alan Floyd. I currently work mostly using Excel and SQL, and am taking this boot camp in order to augment those skills. I will hopefully use these skills to progress my career in finance, or to transition completely to working in data science. In my spare time I enjoy playing soccer and chess, reading, and hanging out with friends.


Carmen Grayson

Healthcare

My name is Carmen Grayson and I enjoy traveling, writing, attending live concerts and museums. I plan to utilize data analytics and visualization with research that will amplify disparities in neonatal/obstetric healthcare and mental health resources.

Process Engineering

My name is Eric Farrell and I am from Alpharetta, GA. I graduated from Georgia Tech in 2017 with a degree in Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering and I currently work as a process engineer. I am able to use the knowledge form this boot camp to more efficiently analyze the data I work with and find new trends in the data.
